name: BigAR My Little Pony - Card Scanner
description: BigAR My Little Pony is your companion app for My Little Pony. Instantly scan cards, check up-to-date prices from Cardmarket.com and create your favorite deck!  Were working on new features, wed love to hear your feedback and suggestions at support@bigar.com!  Prices and images are provided by Cardmarket.com  My Little Pony card images and character names are trademarks of My Little Ponyt. All rights reserved. This app is unaffiliated.  By using this app, you are agreeing to our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy. https://bigar.com/terms-and-conditions/  https://bigar.com/privacy-policy/
